data.title: David Baltimore with the other Nobel Prize winners of 1975
data.meta_description: Baltimore, second from right, and Howard Temin, fourth from right, who shared the Nobel Prize for medicine in 1975. The other winners are, from left: Tjalling Koopmans, Leonid Kantorovich, Aage Bohr, Eugenio Montale, Renato Dulbecco, Vladimir Prelog, Ben Mottlson, Howard Temin, John Cornforth, D.B. and James Rainwater. Photo courtesy of MIT News OfficePhoto from PR1975
